Our INX Preserve offline-capable mobile application is changing the way organisations are collecting environmental data. Our application complements and integrates with our INX Preserve web application so you can conduct in-depth data analysis and manage monitoring programs in a central system. If you don't already have robust environmental monitoring and reporting systems in place, now is the time to act. Request a demo or find out more by visiting https://bit.ly/3sO5ndd Read more about how easy capturing environmental data in remote areas can be: https://bit.ly/3Rgkfu5 #protectingpeopleandplanet #inxsoftware #inxpreserve #esg #environmentalmonitoring #environment Bradley Cobb

Implementing Qube Technologies' continuous monitoring platform demonstrates an organization's commitment to environmental responsibility and public safety. Our comprehensive solution not only aids in the detection and management of methane emissions but also supports operators in maintaining a positive public image and building investor confidence. Champion environmental responsibility and public safety with Qube Technologies. #EnvironmentalResponsibility #PublicSafety #QubeTechnologies https://hubs.la/Q02p4__B0

üåç Explore the Future of Environmental #Ambient #Air #Testing with GERSTEL‚Äôs Dynamic Focusing! üåç We are proud to introduce our groundbreaking Dynamic Focusing technology, a cryogen-free alternative for thermal desorption analysis. Our latest AppNote highlights the robust performance of Dynamic Focusing across a full range of volatilities in VOC and VVOC detection. Key Takeaways: Cryogen-Free Technology: Dynamic Focusing eliminates the need for cryogenic cooling, simplifying the analytical process and reducing potential points of failure. Proven Performance: Successfully validated against rigorous standards such as U.S. EPA TO-17 and ISO 16000-6, ensuring compliance and reliability. Versatility: Effective for both humid and dry environments, making it adaptable to various testing conditions without the risk of analyte breakthrough. Ready to advance your capabilities in environmental analytics? Download your copy of AppNote today and see how GERSTEL's innovation can benefit your lab. üîó https://lnkd.in/e-cGGYxe #EnvironmentalTesting #InnovativeTechnology #AirQuality #VOCAnalysis #makinglabswork

üåø IncQuery joins the OpenSCALING project! üåç Building on our involvement in the EMBrACE project, we're now part of the "OpenSCALING - Open standards for SCALable virtual engineerING and operation" initiative, alongside our main partner, Saab and other esteemed global participants. OpenSCALING, aligned with the European Climate Law, presents us an opportunity to further our expertise in systems engineering and simulation. This project is not just about innovation; it's a commitment to sustainable engineering practices, aiming to reduce energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. üîó Discover more about our role in OpenSCALING: https://bit.ly/47pRcck ITEA4 project: https://bit.ly/41L1PFo #openscaling #mbse #systemsengineering #incquery #digital #engineering #automation

Accelerating permitting to help achieve US clean-energy goals: Permitting can be a major barrier to achieving ambitious clean-energy goals. Some states are acting as laboratories, experimenting with strategies that could be examples for other states. http://dlvr.it/T8RTPx
